version_description:
- Support iOS 9.0
- Update frequency will increase to every 30mins!

- Multiple district selection
- Remembers your preferences, e.g. venues, languages, etc.
- Support venue filtering ('2 consecutive hours', 'fully-booked')
- Floating Time Bar (Beta): moves as you scroll down
- Correct interstitial ad according to AdMob guidelines, avoid accidental clicks

- District selection page now has a prominent 'OK' button, attempt to solve 'cannot close' issue on iOS8/9
- Prevent quick action button from blocking content

- Add 'Yuen Chau Kok Sports Center' (Shatin District)
- Revamped district selection page in hope of solving display issues on certain devices
New Venue: Yuen Long Sports Center (Opens June 6, 2017)
Add Tsing Yi Southwest Sports Centre (Opens July 26th)
Fix scrolling issue on some iOS versions
Fix: certain devices stuck at loading screen
Fix banner ad overlapping content issue
Fix ad issue according to Apple iOS Human Interface Guideline

- Add "Tsuen Wan Sports Center"
- Support iPhone X "notch"
